thread.title: Gigi and Bella Hadid emerge from their hotel in Milan | Daily Mail Online
thread.title_full: Gigi and Bella Hadid emerge from their hotel in Milan | Daily Mail Online

author: Andrew Bullock For Mailonline
title: Gigi and Bella Hadid emerge from their hotel in Milan | Daily Mail Online
text: Share this article Share She added simple black heels and swung a black leather bag in her hand, keeping her thick raven tresses loosely bouncing around her shoulders. She completed the look with white-framed aviators, with pitch black lenses, and a plum shade of lipstick on her pout. All this maudlin shading accentuated the fashion star's pale skin-tone in the flat wintry light. A shade darker: All this maudlin shading accentuated the fashion star's pale skin-tone in the flat wintry light Matchy matchy: The 21-year-old seemed to match her sister's leggings by sporting a belt of a similar design Winter chic: Sister Gigi was looking just as sleek in a similar black top, and long casual trousers with a white strip up the leg Sister Gigi was looking just as sleek in a similar black top, and long casual trousers with a white strip up the leg. She wore a sweeping dark coat and toted a black buckled back over her arm. She seemed to match her sister's leggings by sporting a belt of a similar design. She stepped out in white trainers and kept dark glasses shielding her gaze. The 21-year-old swept her hair up into a tight bun as she strutted alongside her sister. Co-ordinated: They seem to be comparing notes whenever they step out together at the moment Sweeping along: Gigi wore a long dark coat and toted a black buckled back over her arm Pedestrians crossing: They lithely navigated their way through the traffic, surrounded by security guards Out of the rat race: The ladies were later snapped walking through a quieter cobbled street with their entourage Gothic style: Bella completed her look with white-framed aviators, with pitch black lenses, and a plum shade of lipstick on her pout Sleek: All this maudlin shading accentuated the fashion star's pale skin-tone in the flat wintry light Both girls looked a far cry from their normally golden California look as they were flanked photographers. The supermodel sisters showcased their effortless style as they darted through the iconic fashion capital. They lithely navigated their way through the traffic, surrounded by security guards, and were snapped walking through a quieter cobbled street. Out and about: Bella and Gigi Hadid nipped out from their Italian hotel together, where they are staying ahead of Milan Fashion Week A place in the sun: In a brief moment, Bella removed her shades to take a quick look around her, squinting in the Italian sun In a brief moment, Bella removed her shades to take a quick look around her, squinting in the Italian sun. Gigi's stylish display comes after her appearance on the runway for Versus Versace at LFW alongside her younger sister. Incognito: The girls kept dark glasses on their eyes shielding their gaze She had also been promoting her new line with Tommy Hilfiger, but fans were left disappointed when they queued for hours to meet her but she failed to greet them all. The fashion darling dropped in on their flagship store on Brompton Road for a meet-and-greet last week. But some of Gigi's avid followers were left disappointed after she allegedly stayed for just half an hour and only met people wearing wristbands - with one claiming she got 'elbowed in the face'. Mix-and-match: While it was a ripped style that they sported the day before, the double act opted for a darker theme on their latest venture, almost Gothic in theme Instagrammer: Bella has been documenting their whirlwind trip all in the name of fashion Strike a pose: The fashionista was happy to pose for her social media followers Raven maven: Bella was rocking the darker image for the trip to the shows Sara Sampaio was also spotted out and about during Milan's iconic Fashion Week. The brunette beauty looked stylish as she also left her hotel and headed across the street to jump into an awaiting 4X4. Sara was dressed in a cropped green jacket with a fur collar and leather trousers. She also sported black ankle boots and a pair of aviator sunglasses in a rounder design. She kept her hair swept back but allowed her bare midriff to flash bravely in the chill February air. Also in town: Sara Sampaio was also spotted out and about during Milan's iconic Fashion Week Strut: Sara was dressed in a cropped green jacket with a fur collar and leather trousers Smiley: She also sported black ankle boots and a pair of aviator sunglasses in a rounder design Chilly? She kept her hair swept back but allowed her bare midriff to flash bravely in the chill February air Hop in: The brunette beauty looked stylish as she also left her hotel and headed across the street to jump into an awaiting 4X4 Share or comment on this article Most watched News videos
